title: SHUTDOWN_LOADING_SCREEN_NUI
content:
0xB9234AFB// ShutdownLoadingScreenNui
void SHUTDOWN_LOADING_SCREEN_NUI();Closes the NUI loading screen overlay used during player connecting.
codeBlocks:
-- Example usage for SHUTDOWN_LOADING_SCREEN_NUI
CreateThread(function()
    while not HasCollisionLoadedAroundEntity(PlayerPedId()) do
        Wait(0)
    end
    ShutdownLoadingScreenNui()
end)
